name: HLA Object Test Suite 2019
description: This testsuite verifies that the federate sends and receives only the objects and interactions specified in its SOM.

testcases.description:
Tests if SuT registers at least one object instance for each published object class.
Tests if SuT discovers object instances for all object classes with attributes defined as subscribed in CS/SOM.
Tests if SuT shall update attribute values for each published object class attribute.
Tests if SuT shall reflect attribute values for each subscribed object class attribute.
Tests if SuT shall send at least one interaction for each published interaction class.
Tests if SuT shall receive interactions for each subscribed interaction class
